TopicTitle: Cannot print while KSP is running

Articles.Content:
for some odd reason my PC can't connect to any printer while KSP is running

i got FERRAM aerospace and kerbal alarm clock, but i'm pretty sure it's not where the problem is from

is there anyboddy else with the same problem?

thanks

I can't say I've ever heard of anything even remotely like this. I honestly doubt KSP would be the root cause here, even though it seems to be a trigger for the issue.

Some things to try would be making sure your video card drivers are up to date, as are your printer's drivers and any motherboard drivers for USB hubs (or serial ports if your printer is using a serial port).

This is strange.

Sometimes KSP does make my computer act weird, such as sometimes it appears on the task bar when running and sometimes it's not, but it isn't a huge issue.

RAM perhaps? Maybe KSP uses a lot of your resources.
